languages.text: "Ты прав. Лишь нам с тобой известно, что такое обращаться у алтаря к нашему заступнику и умолять о защите для ближних наших. Быть их щитом духа".
"You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar in our struggle to protect those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав. Лишь нам с тобой известно, что такое обращаться у алтаря к нашему заступнику и умолять о защите для ближних наших. Быть их щитом духа".

traits.locale_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar and beg for protection for those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar and beg for protection for those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar and beg for protection for those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar and beg for protection for those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你说得对。只有我们才能明白这种感觉——站在祭坛前，向庇护主真诚地祷告，祈求祂保护我们的至亲至爱。我们会成为他们灵魂的坚盾。”
languages.original_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar in our struggle to protect those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."

traits.locale_text: “你说得对。当我们站在祭坛前，向我们的庇护主真诚地祷告，祈求祂保护我们的至亲至爱时，只有我们才理解这样的感觉。我们会成为祂们灵魂的坚盾。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. Vous et moi sommes les seuls à savoir ce que c'est que d'adresser une prière à notre intercesseur pour qu'il nous aide à protéger ceux qui nous entourent. Nous sommes leur bouclier spirituel. »
languages.original_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar in our struggle to protect those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. Vous et moi sommes les seuls à savoir ce que c'est que d'adresser une prière à notre intercesseur afin qu'il nous permette de protéger ceux qui nous entourent. Nous sommes leur bouclier spirituel. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Wir allein wissen, wie es ist, an einem Altar zu unserem Fürsprecher zu beten, um jene zu schützen, die uns nahe stehen. Wie es ist, ihr spiritueller Schild zu sein."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar in our struggle to protect those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Nur wir wissen, wie es ist, an einem Altar zu unserem Fürsprecher zu beten und um Schutz für unsere Lieben zu bitten. Wie es ist, ihr spiritueller Schild zu sein."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そのとおり。私たちは祭壇で調停者に祈り、親しい人たちの守護を乞うことに奮闘することが何たることかを私たちは知っている。彼らの精神的な盾となるために」
languages.original_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar in our struggle to protect those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおり。私たちは祭壇で調停者に祈り、親しい人たちの守護を乞うことが何たることかを私たちは知っている。彼らの精神的な盾となるために」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Es cierto. Solo nosotros sabemos lo que es rezarle a nuestro intercesor ante el altar durante nuestros esfuerzos por proteger a nuestros allegados. Lo que es ser su escudo espiritual».
languages.original_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar in our struggle to protect those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."

traits.locale_text: «Es cierto. Solo nosotros sabemos lo que es rezarle a nuestro intercesor y pedirle que proteja a nuestros allegados. Lo que es ser su escudo espiritual».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar in our struggle to protect those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."

languages.text: "Haklısın. Bir sunakta şefaatçimize dua etmenin, yakınlarımızı koruma ve onlara ruhani kalkan olma mücadelemizde bize destek olmasını dilemenin nasıl bir şey olduğunu yalnız biz biliriz."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Only we know what it is to pray to our intercessor at an altar in our struggle to protect those close to us. To be their spiritual shield."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın. Bir sunakta şefaatçimize dua etmenin, yakınlarımızı koruma ve onlara ruhani kalkan olma mücadelemizde bize destek olmasını dilemenin nasıl bir şey olduğunu yalnız biz biliriz."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
